abstract: An eclectic group, the board of Bank of America is under scrutiny for the way it has handled overseeing the bank’s chief executive, Kenneth D. Lewis.
snippet: An eclectic group, the board of Bank of America is under scrutiny for the way it has handled overseeing the bank’s chief executive, Kenneth D. Lewis.
lead_paragraph: Gen. Tommy R. Franks, the former chief of the Public Broadcasting System and the publisher of a Spanish newspaper would seem to have nothing in common  except for one thing. They all sit on the board of Bank of America.

headline.main: Bank of America Board Under Gun From Critics
headline.print_headline: Bank of America Board Under Gun From Critics

byline.original: By Louise Story and Julie Creswell

abstract: Gen. Tommy R. Franks, the former chief of the Public Broadcasting System and the publisher of a Spanish newspaper would seem to have nothing in common — except for one thing. They all sit on the board of Bank of America.
